pets.name: sara
pets.bio: Lover: I need constant attention and I hate being away from you
pets.bg: Sara was saved from a high kill shelter. She is very sweet and loving She just wants to be close to her people,so she would make anyone a great companion. Sara is housetrained ,crate trained, and loves car rides. Please ask to meet Sara today. She deserves a forever home.

pets.name: lucky
pets.bio: Athletic: Lucky is a four-year-old terrior mix. His exuberant joy and love for life will bring a smile to your face, guaranteed! Lucky has tons of energy and would make a fantastic running buddy or hiking partner.
pets.bg: If Lucky sounds like the cheerful, athletic friend you`ve been dreaming of, contact us!
